column2: This product is absolutely amazing! I love the quality and it works perfectly.
Terrible experience. The battery died after just two hours of use. Do not buy this!
I was not disappointed at all. The sound is great and the design is beautiful.
Worst customer service ever. They didn't even try to help me fix the issue.
Great, it stopped working right after the warranty expired. Just perfect.
The delivery was fast, but the item itself is completely useless and broken.
Highly recommended! It completely changed the way I work every day.
It is not bad, but I definitely expected something much better for this price.
